short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Duino Coin wallet extension so that you dont have to go to the official website with the slow animations and loading time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I created a Duino coin wallet that was simplified for the best user experience. You can view your miners, transactions and wallet. Your password saves locally so you don't have to login every time you want to check your wallet quickly.
